name: Volcano BoB (Ludum Dare 49 Jam)
description:
The ancient volcano spirits awaken, they are hungry and their cries make unstable the earth and skies. Appease them by providing sacrifices. Can you make it all the way across the archipelago?

Move using (A, S, W, D) or the Arrow keys. = Action (Grab, Drop, Sacrifice, Sail boat).

This was my first attempt at a game jam for Ludum Dare 49 (theme: unstable). Just delighted to have submitted something in time. Enjoyed the challenge and learned a lot along the way.

Enjoy!
